subject: Pro pedals
description_text:
I had purchased a set of your pro pedals about 11 months ago and over the last few months of use they have became really sloppy and are showing input even when not used !? If possible would I be able to get some support on this !? 

Thanks, Caden

conversations.body_text: Hi Caden Hackbarth,    Please provide your order number and we shall assist you in resolving the matter. Do not worry.
